NarrPara.Content: TODO: enable this when we have DNF normalisation? (It cannot use the (x+1 \in \nat \implies x+1=10) conjunct)
TODO: this one needs pre-evaluation of the type 2..2
This test case used to expose a subtle bug in Unfold.hs of Jaza until it was fixed.
A schema written by Dana that exposed scope errors in the one-point rule of Jaza.
This was executable with Jaza after exists were expanded inline within schemas.
These, from Shaochun, failed to evaluate with Jaza until the fixes of 6/12/2000.
